dPBE: Discrete Population Balance Equations
  • pop module
  • View page source

pop module

abc

Solving 1D, 2D and 3D DISCRETE population balance equations for agglomerating systems.

Authors: Frank Rhein (frank.rhein@kit.edu), Haoran Ji (haoran.ji@kit.edu) Affiliation: Karlsruhe Institute of Technology (KIT), Institute of Mechanical Process Engineering and Mechanics

class pop.population(dim, t_exp=10, file=None, disc='geo')[source]

Bases: object

Class definition for calculating discrete population balance equations

Parameters

dimint

Dimension of PBE in [1, 2, 3].

gridstr

Discretization strategy in [‘uni’, ‘geo’].

NSint

Number of grid points per dimension.
